name: Oboz Livingston Low Slip On Shoes - Men's
description: When getting you "to-do" list done is the order of the day, these shoes are ready. From early morning dog walks, to yard work, to relaxing with a cold drink, these slip-ons are versatile will be comfortable all-day long.Rugged, tumbled nubuck leather uppers.Rubber toe cap protects the leading edge of your foot.Roomy toebox gives your toes freedom.O FIT™ triple-density removable insoles allow your foot to relax into a neutral position for all-day comfort.Sawtooth midsole uses a dual-density EVA foam finds the right balance of stability and comfort.Rigid nylon shank keeps your foot supported on all types of terrain.Sawtooth outsole is an Oboz favourite and provides excellent traction.Topographic map of the Sawtooth mountains near Sun Valley, Idaho moulded into the sole.
